text:
we just continue to put up walls instead of building bridges. I’m not asking for forgiveness. Just cooperation.
Please let’s start the new year with an excuse to do better.
Message 146 of 4024
The solution offered by the professional was reunification therapy with Max which I hope will start soon
The professional also recommended we not talk directly but communicate through this app. I agree with that recommendation as it has been not
good for either of our mental health.
As Adrian transitions back to me I request you respect the same courtesy afforded you during your time with him and refrain from communications
unless essential. We both agree that has worked well.
Sent:12/31/2023 at 04:46 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/31/2023 at 04:46 PM)
Subject:Re: Thoughts on Max (for tomorrow)
Message 147 of 4024
So Dr Brown said
- Marriage therapy with all three of us on Sat
- Divorce therapy to us in an email Thursday
- You are saying that she said don’t talk at all
It’s fair to say:
- we have heard different things each time
- we choose the one that we each want to hear
- none of it is working and we are ignoring that
So what is the definition of insanity?
Why are you fighting against trying to learn to work together? Really? Is it for appearances to someone else? Is it pride? It’s not working. It’s our kids
mental health. Quit hearing what you want to hear and only adopting what you want. For Christ’s sake Christine, let’s try something that allows us to
work together.
Is it that dangerous? What do we have to loose?
Sent:12/31/2023 at 04:53 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/01/2024 at 06:36 AM)
Subject:Re: Thoughts on Max (for tomorrow)
Message 148 of 4024
Obviously I sent this before we chatted.
Too bad there is no “unsend” on here..
Sent:12/31/2023 at 09:31 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/01/2024 at 06:37 AM)
Subject:Re: Thoughts on Max (for tomorrow)
